title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6200.5 - Expenditures not exceeding $50
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6200.5 - Expenditures not exceeding $50

State Regulations

Expenditures made by any individual or political committee
for or on behalf of the nomination or election of any candidate or candidates
for or on behalf of any question to be submitted to vote at a public election, in an aggregate amount not exceeding $50 during any calendar year shall not be
deemed a "contribution other than of money," and any individual or political
committee, by the fact of any such expenditures alone, shall not be required to
comply with the provisions of sections
14-102
and
14-118
of the

Election Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6200.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
